definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
(math.) theory of functions of a real variable

sentences.english: This is a lobar pneumonia in which consolidation of the entire left upper lobe has occurred.
sentences.chinese: 左肺上叶全部实变的大叶性肺炎。

sentences.english: ConclusionsThe most common radiological features of COP were pulmonary consolidation and GGO.
sentences.chinese: COP最常见的是肺实变和磨玻璃样变。

sentences.english: Radiographically, areas of consolidation appear as infiltrates .
sentences.chinese: 放射照片上实变区域类似浸润。

sentences.english: At a more cephalad level, patchy consolidation and ground-glass opacity are visible.
sentences.chinese: 在近头侧层面，可见斑片状实变和毛玻璃样影。

sentences.english: Approaches of creating problem situation during the inquiry-based physics teaching;
sentences.chinese: 讨论实变函数论课程的主题情境分析问题。

sentences.english: Nodular consolidation was found in 2 cases.
sentences.chinese: 结节状气腔实变病灶2例。

sentences.english: Functions of real variable is an essential basic theory in modern analysis.
sentences.chinese: 实变函数论是现代分析必不可少的理论基础。

sentences.english: CT scan reveals bilateral lower lobe consolidation with air bronchograms.
sentences.chinese: CT扫描显示双侧肺下叶实变以及充气支气管征。

definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
mediastinum (organs and tissues in the thorax between the lungs)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
